scripts.dev:stack: sh -c 'PORT=${PORT:-3012}; pkill -f "tsx watch backend/src/server.ts" 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f "backend/src/server.ts" 2>/dev/null || true; PIDS=$(lsof -tiTCP:${PORT} -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$PIDS" ]; then kill -9 $PIDS; fi; JWT_SECRET=${JWT_SECRET:-dev} PORT=${PORT} npm run backend:watch > /tmp/reddoor-backend.log 2>&1 & BACK_PID=$!; i=0; until curl -fsS "http://127.0.0.1:${PORT}/health" >/dev/null 2>&1; do i=$((i+1)); if [ $i -ge 80 ]; then echo "Backend failed to become healthy on port ${PORT}."; tail -n 120 /tmp/reddoor-backend.log; kill $BACK_PID 2>/dev/null || true; exit 1; fi; if ! kill -0 $BACK_PID 2>/dev/null; then echo "Backend process exited."; tail -n 120 /tmp/reddoor-backend.log; exit 1; fi; sleep 0.25; done; DUALMODE_BACKEND_PORT=${DUALMODE_BACKEND_PORT:-${PORT}} npm run dev'
